Sorry for the noise, before posting this issue I had searched for hours, however just now I found the solution to my problem -and I'm not sure the issue I've raised is an actual bug or not-

b = tf.slice(x, [1], [-1])

body:
Sorry for the noise, before posting this issue I had searched for hours, however just now I found the solution to my problem -and I'm not sure the issue I've raised is an actual bug or not-

```
b = tf.slice(x, [1], [-1])
```
